rows.label: tlk43200142_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Buy all the stuff in a shop, and
you'll be able to buy ownership
rights! You even know that, bonehead?

rows.label: tlk43200142_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Once you're an owner, you get
special bonuses for life!

rows.label: tlk43200142_04_msg0003
rows.name:
But, even you know that going on Merc
Missions increases the range of stuff
you can buy at a shop, right?

rows.label: tlk43200142_04_msg0005
rows.name:
...Yep, that was another
one of my dad's lectures.
Real charmer, isn't he?

rows.label: tlk43200142_04_msg0006
rows.name:
It can't be easy becoming a
shop owner. But I'm sure
you'll manage it one day.
